# MrCrayfish's Vehicle Mod (1.20.1 Forge)

**Fully updated for Minecraft 1.20.1!** MrCrayfish's Vehicle Mod brings an exciting collection of vehicles to enhance your Minecraft experience. Explore, farm, transport, race, and fly with over 20 customizable vehicles. 

## üöó Key Features

- **New Vehicles**: Added 3 new vehicles exclusive to 1.20.1 update
- **Modern Rendering**: Improved vehicle models and textures using Forge 47.1.0
- **Enhanced Performance**: Optimized physics and collision systems
- **Java 17 Support**: Fully compatible with modern Java versions
- **Updated Fuel System**: Supports new fluid mechanics in 1.20.1

### üîß Customization Options:
* **Visuals**: Spray paint vehicles with any dye combination
* **Performance**: Mix and match engines and wheels for different terrains
* **Accessories**: Add storage trunks, trailers, and special equipment

### ‚õΩ Fuel & Production:
* Simple fuel production system (great for beginners)
* Compatible with popular tech mods like Create and Immersive Engineering
* Industrial fuel drums with 75,000mB capacity

### üéÆ Controls:
* Full keyboard/mouse support
* Optional [Controllable](https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/controllable) mod integration for gamepad support
* Camera modes optimized for vehicle operation

## üì¶ Installation
1. Install [Forge 47.1.0](https://files.minecraftforge.net/net/minecraftforge/forge/index_1.20.1.html)
2. Download Vehicle Mod from [CurseForge](https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/mrcrayfishs-vehicle-mod/files)
3. Place in `mods` folder
4. **Required**: Install [Framework](https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/framework) mod

## ‚ùì FAQ
**Q: Is this compatible with [Create]?**  
A: Yes! Vehicles work with Create contraptions

**Q: Can I use shaders?**  
A: Yes, Complementary Shaders recommended

**Q: How do I craft vehicles?**  
A: Use the Workstation block with vehicle blueprints

**Q: Will this work with Fabric?**  
A: Forge only - check our GitHub for Fabric port progress

## üîÑ Update Notes (v0.46.0)
- Ported to Minecraft 1.20.1
- New vehicle: Cherry Wood Speedboat
- Improved underwater physics
- Fixed trailer connection issues
- Optimized fuel consumption
